Warranty.description:
Null values: not allowed
Empty arrays: allowed

WarrantyId.description:
Maps to the field Warranties.WarrantyId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

WarrantyDescription.description:
Maps to the field Warranties.WarrantyDescription in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

WarrantyPeriod.description:
Maps to the field Warranties.WarrantyPeriod in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: allowed

WarrantyUnit.description:
Maps to the field Warranties.WarrantyUnit in your WinMan database where D = Days, W = Weeks, M = Months, Y = Years.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed
